message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to sell you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $140.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can we meet in the middle at $132.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $137.50. I believe it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I understand you're trying to get a good price, but I'm still thinking $130 is a fair price for the product. Can we meet in the middle at $131.50?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more to make it worth my while. How about $135? I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit short. How about we meet at $133? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

I'm glad we're getting close to a deal, Bob! However, I need to make a bit more to meet my minimum price. How about $138? I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I'm not willing to go up to $138, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $133 and $138. How about $135.50? I think that's a fair price for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob! However, I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $135.5 and $138, just like you suggested. How about $136.75? I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $136. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price. Can we do $136?
